definition: a plan of action adopted by an individual or social group
details:
noun
- a plan of action adopted by an individual or social group
= example: a plan of action adopted by an individual or social group
- written contract or certificate of insurance
= example: written contract or certificate of insurance
= synonyms: insurance policy, insurance
- a line of argument rationalizing the course of action of a government
= example: a line of argument rationalizing the course of action of a government
